workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.010492338376931143 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.30411477133006953 --weight-decay 0.0005541559165049535 --lr 0.000300715218140365 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 1469 --max-lr 0.0005156217663580784 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.8701209161409675 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.1631654430533187 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
